channel.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
channel.description:
well here is the problem, i hope you can help me out with this one cause its got me stuck.
ok, so i am using allstarscape as my base or source and for some reason when i try to trade one of the shops in the shopping area it just freezes my thing and then i need to close and re open.
there was 1 shop that worked out of about maybe 6 and then i edited it so it had a different item in it and then i tried to trade... same thing..
please could someone help me out it would be very appreciated. :)

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @billycu billycu
item.description:
@billycu wrote:

ok well ive deleeted all of my spawns, all the wanneshop stuff and the stuff in the shop.cgf file but when i go runserver it comes up in the command prompt window thing with

- fiendscape v1 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 6000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)

and i cant log into the server.

thank you for all your help

Read full topic
item.source: In a bit of a pickle :S

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

yea any id’s in ur shop above something like 7600 with freeze mopars client. Either go to client.silabsoft.org or clear ur shops

Read full topic

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

its ur client, try looking in the shop, prob a high id that causes u 2 crash

or if u using mopar client, try silabsoft

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @r8edhardknock03 r8edhardknock03
item.description:
@r8edhardknock03 wrote:

How do i change the Shops prices for stuff on my Server?

Read full topic
item.source: In a bit of a pickle :S

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“billycu, post:3, topic:261581”][quote author=dogzound5@gmail.com link=topic=345451.msg2663154#msg2663154 date=1234353294]
But make sure that you inserted your shop into the One Click NPC method. If you didn’t do this correctly then you would have problems with opening the shop.
[/quote]

ok well i have deleted all of the spawns of the npcs for the shops i will have to go into the client document and edit them out am i right?

also the one click method i may have missed that in a tutorial ill give it a search now, thanks

thanks :)[/quote]

Yes you will need to remove the wanneshops if you removed the NPCs opening them, and have edited them out of the shops configuration file.

Read full topic
item.source: In a bit of a pickle :S

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @billycu billycu
item.description:
@billycu wrote:

dogzound5@gmail.com:

But make sure that you inserted your shop into the One Click NPC method. If you didn’t do this correctly then you would have problems with opening the shop.

ok well i have deleted all of the spawns of the npcs for the shops i will have to go into the client document and edit them out am i right?

also the one click method i may have missed that in a tutorial ill give it a search now, thanks

thanks

Read full topic
item.source: In a bit of a pickle :S

item.title: In a bit of a pickle :S
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

What I would recommend you doing is cleaning out most shops that Allstar made and start over so you can get everything better organized. But make sure that you inserted your shop into the One Click NPC method. If you didn’t do this correctly then you would have problems with opening the shop.

Read full topic
